MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.21am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:07am on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
